name: Shipping Address QR code for Invoices & Packing lists
author: PT Woo Plugins (by Webdados)

sections.description:
Adds a QR Code with the Shipping Address link on Google Maps into several Invoices and Packing lists plugins.

Useful for setting the navigation destination address directly in the Google Maps app on your smartphone when you’re delivering your orders.

Uses the QR code API on goqr.me

Features:

  • Inserts a QR Code with the Shipping Address link on Google Maps, that can be scanned by the delivery courier with his smartphone, into documents generated by the following plugins:
    • Print Invoices & Packing lists
    • WooCommerce Print Invoice & Delivery Note
    • WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes & Shipping Labels
    • If you need to insert the QR Code on any other plugin document or admin screen, drop us a line.
  • Inserts a QR code with the Shipping Address link on Google Maps on the order edit screen, if true is returned to the woo_qr_pip_wf_order_edit_screen filter
  • WPML tested and compatible;
  • PHP7 tested and compatible;

Other (premium) plugins

Already know our other WooCommerce (premium) plugins?

  • Shop as Client for WooCommerce – Quickly create orders on behalf of your customers
  • Taxonomy/Term and Role based Discounts for WooCommerce – Easily create bulk discount rules for products based on any taxonomy terms (built-in or custom)
  • Simple WooCommerce Order Approval – The hassle-free solution for WooCommerce orders approval before payment
sections.installation: • Use the included automatic install feature on your WordPress admin panel and search for ‚ÄúShipping Address QR code for Invoices‚Äù.
sections.faq:
Can this plugin insert the QR Code somewhere else?

Maybe we can implement it. Drop us a line.

Is this plugin compatible with the new WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage?

Yes.

Is this plugin compatible with the new WooCommerce block-based Cart and Checkout?

Yes.

I need help, can I get technical support?

This is a free plugin. It‚Äôs our way of giving back to the wonderful WordPress community.

There‚Äôs a support tab on the top of this page, where you can ask the community for help. We‚Äôll try to keep an eye on the forums but we cannot promise to answer support tickets.

If you reach us by email or any other direct contact means, we‚Äôll assume you are in need of urgent, premium, and of course, paid-for support.

Where do I report security vulnerabilities found in this plugin?

You can report any security bugs found in the source code of this plugin through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team will assist you with verification, CVE assignment and take care of notifying the developers of this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.5 – 2023-12-13

  • Declare WooCommerce block-based Cart and Checkout compatibility
  • Requires WordPress 5.4
  • Tested with WordPress 6.5-alpha-57159 and WooCommerce 8.4.0

1.4 – 2023-07-20

  • Inserts a QR code with the Shipping Address link on Google Maps on the order edit screen, if true is returned to the woo_qr_pip_wf_order_edit_screen filter
  • Minor code refactoring
  • Requires WooCommerce 5.0
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3-beta4-56226 and WooCommerce 7.9

1.3.0 – 2023-04-17

  • Tested and confirmed WooCommerce HPOS compatibility
  • New filter woo_qr_pip_qr_size to set the WR Code size in pixels
  • WordPress Coding Standards
  • Requires WooCommerce 4.0
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3-alpha-55644 and WooCommerce 7.6

1.2.0 – 2022-06-29

  • New brand: PT Woo Plugins ü•≥
  • Requires WordPress 5.0, WooCommerce 3.0 and PHP 7.0
  • Tested with WordPress 6.1-alpha-53556 and WooCommerce 6.7.0-beta.2

1.1.2

  • Tested with WordPress 5.2.5-alpha and WooCommerce 3.8.0

1.1.1

  • Changed the plugin name and description

1.1

  • Added support for “WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes & Shipping Labels” (to select in which document types the QR Code is inserted use the [woo_qr_pip_wf_document_types](https://gist.github.com/webdados/ea7fb1703fc3888ebf4800be6ddf7406) filter)
  • Added the WC requires at least tag on the plugin main file (WooCommerce 3.0 and above)
  • Tested with WooCommerce 3.5.1 and bumped the WC tested up to tag
  • Bumped Tested up to tag
  • Release sponsored by Cateringhuset

1.0.2.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 3.3
  • Bumped Tested up to tag

1.0.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 3.2
  • Added WC tested up to tag on the plugin main file
  • Bumped Tested up to tag

1.0.1

  • readme.txt updates

1.0

  • Initial release sponsored by Cateringhuset

0.9

  • Initial beta release.
